channel.title: Someone help me :(
channel.description: Hey, I'm fairly new to server hosting. But i've got the server non-hamachi amongst other stuff, I'm just wondering if anyone could help me on making the server a dedicated one. I'm tired of just having it on at certain times. If someone could help me on this, I will be soo thankfull! :D

item.title: Someone help me :(
item.dc:creator: @dary3113 dary3113
item.description:
@dary3113 wrote:

[quote=“Jelenim, post:2, topic:336748”]Well, only you can do this part yourself. Buy a VPS, or keep your PC and internet on 24/7.
www.vpsland.com[/quote][quote=“VestaPK, post:3, topic:336748”]You need a VPS they are usually quite expensive but these are relitively cheap but the only one you will be able to use for what you want is the MMO Huge

The link for the cheap VPS is

http://frugooscape.net/?action=buyvps

Hope I helped.[/quote]

Thanks guys, I think I will have a pass on makign it dedicated :L

Read full topic

Well, only you can do this part yourself. Buy a VPS, or keep your PC and internet on 24/7.

VPSLand Merges with JaguarPC - Jaguarpc

What You Can Expect During the Transition First and foremost, all of your servers will remain untouched and online. The merger between
